name: easy-fixer
description: This is a monorepo that contains all the apps related to Easy Fixer, which is a platform to connect clients with in-your-location service providers such as handymans.
author: Easy Fixer

scripts.install:all: npm install && npm run install:api && npm run install:web && npm run setup-nav
scripts.clean:all: npm run clean && cd apps/api && npm run clean && cd ../web && npm run clean && cd ../..
scripts.deep-clean:all: npm run deep-clean && cd apps/api && npm run deep-clean && cd ../web && npm run deep-clean && cd ../..
scripts.deep-clean: npx rimraf package-lock.json && npm run clean
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd apps/api && npm run dev" "cd apps/web && npm run dev"
scripts.build: cd apps/api && npm run build && cd ../web && npm run build
scripts.start: cd apps/api && npm run start && cd ../web && npm run start
scripts.lint: eslint . && cd apps/api && npm run lint && cd ../web && npm run lint
scripts.lint:fix: eslint --fix . && cd apps/api && npm run lint:fix && cd ../web && npm run lint:fix
scripts.test: cd apps/api && npm run test:run && cd ../web && npm run test:run
scripts.test:coverage: cd apps/api && npm run test:coverage && cd ../web && npm run test:coverage
